title: Caucus cowardice
author: VD
content_html:
It is intriguing that when I say women tend to harbor an extreme distaste for making decisions and being held responsible for their words and actions, this is taken to be evidence of my [select one or more of the following: a) mysogyny, b) fear of women, c) fear of strong, independent women, d) inability to get laid], but when Hillary Rodham Clinton suggests the very same thing as an excuse for her unexpectedly bad poll standing in Iowa, it is interpreted as a reasonable rationale for modifying America’s traditional electoral process.

I have a very simple solution for this terrible dilemma. Don’t permit women to vote. Problem solved.
content_text:

], but when Hillary Rodham Clinton suggests
the very same thing
as an excuse for her unexpectedly bad poll standing in Iowa, it is interpreted as a reasonable rationale for modifying America’s traditional electoral process.
I have a very simple solution for this terrible dilemma.  Don’t permit women to vote.  Problem solved.
